access.masterContextRequiredDescription: This feature is exclusive to the Master context. To edit, please return to the Master Global context (without acting as an instance).
access.permissionNeededDescription: You do not have permission to access these tools.

debugCard.title: Debug & Development
debugCard.description: Tools and options for developers. These controls will not be visible in a production environment.

actionsCard.title: System Actions
actionsCard.description: The actions below directly modify the database or system files and should be used with extreme caution.

syncModules.title: Sync/Import Modules
syncModules.description: This action reads the 'src/modules' directory and updates the system's manual manifest ('known-module-folders.ts'). Use this after adding a new module folder to make it available for registration.
syncModules.permissionNeeded: You do not have permission to import modules.

seedPresets.title: Seed Default Editor Presets
seedPresets.description: Populates the database with the default content presets for the rich text editors (Lexical and TipTap). This is useful for initial setup or for restoring default content templates.
seedPresets.dialogDescription: This will add or overwrite default editor presets. Are you sure?

seedManual.title: Seed Default Manual Articles
seedManual.description: Populates the database with the default articles for the user manual. This action can be used to set up the help documentation for the first time.
seedManual.dialogDescription: This will add or overwrite default manual articles. Are you sure?

cleanupModules.title: Cleanup Module Definitions
cleanupModules.description: This action scans all module definitions and removes duplicates or obsolete documents, consolidating them into a clean state based on their unique ID (slug).
cleanupModules.dialogDescription: This will permanently delete duplicate or old module definitions. This action cannot be undone.
